content.html:
this patch fixes the test

diff -r e8f9a5987628 -r bc2a33f26e37 gazebo/gui/SaveDialog_TEST.cc
--- a/gazebo/gui/SaveDialog_TEST.cc Tue Jun 16 16:17:16 2015 -0700
+++ b/gazebo/gui/SaveDialog_TEST.cc Tue Jul 14 23:34:37 2015 -0700
@@ -29,7 +29,7 @@
   QVERIFY(fileDialog);

   // set default path to home dir.
-  fileDialog->selectFile(QDir::homePath());
+  fileDialog->setDirectory(QDir::homePath());

   // hit enter to close dialog
   QTest::keyClick(fileDialog, Qt::Key_Enter);

I think selectFile is meant for files and not directories and since our file browser dialog is currently configured to pick directories, the function returns unexpected selectedFiles (at least that's the case on osx) .
